name: Bandolero - Serie T Traficantes - Picaros
additionalNotes: The Bandolero is a premium cigar brand released by Selected Tobacco, which was founded by Nelson Alfonso. The Bandolero Serie T Traficantes is a premium cigar line that features a natural Ecuadorian wrapper blended with a binder of undisclosed origin with Peruvian ligero tobacco in the filler. Once lit, this outstanding blend provides a rich complexity of flavors and a good amount of strength that's extremely well balanced making for an enjoyable smoking experience.
